item.title: Hello Friend
item.description: "Hello, friend?" That's lame. Maybe I should give you a name... But that's a slippery slope. You're only in my head. We have to remember that... Shit. It's actually happened. I'm talking to an imaginary person. **â€” Mr. Robot S01E01** -- I built this website because I missed one. I used Hugo as you can see from footer, and I used this amazing theme by panr.
